meanings.definition: The day on which an employee receives their wages or salary.
meanings.sent1: On payday, I get my hard-earned money.
meanings.sent2: My payday is on the last Friday of the month.
meanings.sent3: I always look forward to payday to treat myself to a nice dinner.
meanings.sent4: Receiving my paycheck on payday feels like a small victory.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of payday never gets old for me.

meanings.definition: The day on which a debt or loan must be repaid.
meanings.sent1: I marked my calendar for the payday of my loan.
meanings.sent2: Don't forget, tomorrow is the payday for your borrowed money.
meanings.sent3: It's like payday for my debt, time to settle up.
meanings.sent4: The payday for my loan is looming closer.
meanings.sent5: The payday for my debt is a deadline I can't miss.
